title: Can't connect to game
body: As shown in the screenshot, a game has started, but the actual game tab doesn't open. There's no reconnect to game button, and the issue persists even after restarting my client. I've recently only been playing ARAM games, and have witnessed several people never connecting to a game, but never thought much of it, but now I suspect something similar might've happened to them as well.

replies.body: Open Task Manager and end process for League client.exe. The reconnect button will appear and you can get into the game.

I too have this issue. I've experienced in twice in three days now while playing ranked games. It's nice losing LP and getting a leaver for no reason while on win streaks. There's no firewall or permissions issue on my end so bumping in hope for an answer.

This is an odd issue, so your best bet (and OPs) is probably going to be looking into connection troubleshooting (things like firewalls and antivirus first I'd say) and maybe a reinstall as well.

Failing all that, a ticket to player support can often get you some more specific advice, since tech isn't really my area: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
